website_summaries.verdict: Aside from a few quirks, if you'd like to plant a large variety of herb seeds without spending a lot of money, this collection of 12 herbs is a good deal.
pros: Gardeners who frequently use herbs to cook will appreciate this collection of 12 popular culinary herb seeds at an affordable price
cons: Inconsistent germination – some growers rave about how quickly they sprout, while a few others had less success
Rare reports of empty seed packets

customer_reviews.title: Did not arrive with a Mylar Pouch/ Instruction book.
customer_reviews.text: Seed packet arrived with all variety of seeds listed in the bulletin which are: Parsley, Thyme, Cilantro, Basil, Dill, Oregano, Peppermint, Chives, Savory, Garlic Chives, Mustard, Sage. So far I'm happy with what I've received. I have the seeds germinating via paper towel, hydrogen peroxide and the zip lock bag method. I will post updates upon germination and harvest. Package did not arrive with a Mylar pouch, or an instruction book as listed. It arrived with a paper seed envelope that contained all 12 herb packets.
customer_reviews.author: Hammadi

customer_reviews.title: do not buy!!!
customer_reviews.text: peppermint packet is empty ! what kind of quality control it is? returning !
customer_reviews.author: yuliya borovskiy

customer_reviews.title: Not much success with seeds from scratch
customer_reviews.text: These herbs have not grown at all. I planted watered only when needed, used great potting soil and still had no success. It has been almost two months and nothing grew. I was very frustrated and an unsatisfied customer. I even researched on the internet lots of do's and don't, I wanted to have this great herb garden.
customer_reviews.author: Jesse/Tara

customer_reviews.title: Large, healthy plants with great taste and fragrance
customer_reviews.text: I bought these last year and had amazing results. Everything I planted was thriving. My favorite was the chives, sage and basil. They yielded a lot of use last summer. I used so much basil that my boyfriend was getting tired of it. Haha. After transplanting the basil to a bigger pot it got strong and the main stalk was thick and sturdy. The basil itself tasted soo good, and the leaves were so large that one or two leaves were more than enough for a dish made for two. I am using up the rest of the seeds this year.
customer_reviews.author: Brandi

customer_reviews.title: Nice variety and easy to grow
customer_reviews.text: I grew a everything herb seeds that came in this assortment. All herbs grew, nothing failed. As long as you care/follow the care guidelines you shouldn’t have any problems. I grouped them together by how they grew, and sunlight. For beginners I definitely recommend doing research on growing conditions, depending on the region you live in depicts how your herbs grow.
customer_reviews.author: Ashley Murray

customer_reviews.title: Bad seeds
customer_reviews.text: So.. after some time, only my basil turned out good. I planted chives and parsley and cilantro and marjoram and oregano and dill, and only parsley turned out right ok. My dill sprouted but died soon after, the same with cilantro. I think I got bad seeds? I want the same variety but good seeds this time around.
customer_reviews.author: Magda Wnekiewicz

customer_reviews.title: No Luck
customer_reviews.text: I prepared a perfectly laid out herb garden; twelve indivicual sections, a wonderful combination of soil (sand and top soil). I planted your seeds exactly 21 days ago. We have had warm/hot weather and I have kept the soil moist. However, here comes the bad news. The ONLY seeds that have germinated so far is a tiny spot of chives (about the size of a quarter).
customer_reviews.author: Ray Richardson

customer_reviews.title: Herbs packet
customer_reviews.text: Great set of seeds for the value. It had all the herbs that I need and they are growing like crazy for me
customer_reviews.author: raz

customer_reviews.title: Edited review
customer_reviews.text: Update: Contacted the seller about the two packs of seeds that didn't grow and am VERY impressed with the prompt and polite response. Not only that, but they rush shipped two new packs of seeds to me. The customer service alone is worth updating to five stars, bonus that they sent more seeds to try. Super happy! :) Nice to have a variety of herb seeds in one order, not so nice that none of the mint or cilantro seeds grew.
customer_reviews.author: Casey S.

customer_reviews.title: Only two plants germinated
customer_reviews.text: I tried growing these directly in the dirt outside first and got zero germination. I figured maybe some birds snacked on the seeds, so that's on me. Then I planted the seeds inside using the same pods that I used on other seeds from a different vendor only a couple weeks previous with great results. Sadly, only the basil and oregano germinated. It was very disappointing. I don't know if I just got a bunk batch, but I would not purchase these again to find out.
customer_reviews.author: manxita

customer_reviews.title: Quality product.
customer_reviews.text: Really liked that the seed packets came inside a foil, resealable pouch so all were fresh and protected from moisture and air. So far have planted many in window boxes and the sprouts are coming in at about 95% germination which is excellent. Have not had time to grow to use-able state however, will have enough for the entire neighborhood when they reach harvest size. Very satisfied with performance so far. Will update as they grow and are transplanted into porch rail planters and raised garden beds.
customer_reviews.author: R. AUDETTE

customer_reviews.title: Yum, fresh herbs!
customer_reviews.text: I didn't plant them all but of the 5 varieties I did, the Oregano seeds are all dead. None of them came up. I have tried twice over the past month and nothing. Oh well, can't win them all. Not sure if I'm going to plant the others for fear of them not germinating either and then I'll be mad and wanting them at all. But I will say these are by far the best Cilantro seeds I have ever had. They grew quickly and taste very fresh and mellow. And the Basil is doing great too. As for the Parley & Thyme they're a little weak, but these are all young plants so we will see sooner than later.
customer_reviews.author: Carlita's Camp

customer_reviews.title: Good germination rate, be careful of mold
customer_reviews.text: I'm pretty excited about these seeds! This is my first garden, so i am also very nervous. I've seen a very good germination rate so far, but i do have a small concern. My cilantro seeds wont take at all, and have started molding. I threw those out and started new ones, which i hope will take better. I'll be keeping a much keener eye on them, and trying out a few different methods. All the other seeds have done fantastically!!! I'm very excited for my new garden!!! Thank you so much!!
customer_reviews.author: bubbles

customer_reviews.title: They didn’t grow!
customer_reviews.text: I planted my seeds, some in my garden and some in small pots just to get them started, and only a few sprouted. Then the few that came up died within a few weeks. It could have been my gardening, but I’ve had success with other brands of seeds, and these were all duds. I will not buy from them again.
customer_reviews.author: Megan H.

customer_reviews.title: I just received them today and I have planted some ...
customer_reviews.text: I just received them today and I have planted some of the dill. I will review hell the seeds germinate later I will say the packaging could not be more professional !! Day 6 and nothing. I am having my doubts about these seeds!! I need to update this again ! I apologize for all of the changes on this review but after my last review the next day all of the seeds popped up and they are a few inches high now and doing well I can’t say that I understand why it took so long but they are looking fantastic so I need to write a positive review
customer_reviews.author: Dave Ammerman

customer_reviews.title: Not all the seeds germinated
customer_reviews.text: I liked the assortment of seeds, except for getting a duplicate of one. The negative is that 4 of the seed packets had seeds that did not germinate. I tried several times and nothing grew at all. Mint was one of them and that is one of the easiest things to grow. I don't think in general that they are quality seeds to begin with or something would have grown from the four packets with multiple attempts.
customer_reviews.author: Honest opinion

customer_reviews.title: Great for starting an herb garden
customer_reviews.text: Great for starting your herb garden, but there's a few herbs I feel it's missing. Almost everything sprouted and gave me fresh herbs for my food all last summer/fall. I had a hard time with the basil (mainly from pests) and all the garlic chives I planted never sprouted. Would buy again, but probably going to buy individual seed packs from local store now that I have a decent variety started.
customer_reviews.author: J. Laine

customer_reviews.title: The seeds do grow, just takes time
customer_reviews.text: I wanted to start growing my own plants so I ordered these seeds mostly for the price. I started these guys on the 6 and 9th of March. They were put under growlights for 16 hours a day and watered only when dry. They seem to be doing well so far. The peppermint however has been growing very very slowly. It was the only seed packet that also came in an additional was bag. I have not used the mustard greens, chives and thyme seed packaging yet.
customer_reviews.author: Shola

customer_reviews.title: My package had no instruction booklet like everyone says it comes with
customer_reviews.text: My package had no instruction booklet like everyone says it comes with. My seeds are not in a resealable package. I had to tape the package closed to keep the rest of the seeds from falling out They came the other day, so I don't know if they'll sprout. Keeping my fingers crossed. Gowning them indoors with a grow light.
customer_reviews.author: Jennifer M

customer_reviews.title: Not All Viable Seeds - Some Never Sprouted
customer_reviews.text: The sage is growing like crazy. Despite proper growing conditions, none of the mint germinated, which was incredibly frustrating. Garlic Chives also did not sprout. Only one basil plant germinated of the many seeds I planted.
customer_reviews.author: Sarah

customer_reviews.title: Four thumbs up
customer_reviews.text: Everything I planted sprouted! I have a healthy crop of seedling that I couldn't be happier with and hopefully, if I don't end up killing them, I'll be enjoying the results in my cooking soon. As a bonus I had enough seeds to not only create the herb garden I'd dreamed of but also share with a friend :)
customer_reviews.author: Tiwohunter

customer_reviews.title: So excited for my herbs!
customer_reviews.text: Amazing! This is my first time gardening, I've always wanted to do it and now I finally am. These seeds are doing very well! I have them growing in a large planter on my patio. It's been raining so much, I haven't really watered them at all - nature is just taking it's course and they are growing quickly and wonderfully! Great seeds for any beginner, I would say. Thank you very much!
customer_reviews.author: Kat F.

customer_reviews.title: Not the right seeds.
customer_reviews.text: The seeds that came in the package were not the ones listed.
customer_reviews.author: Kimity

customer_reviews.title: Just what I wanted and more!
customer_reviews.text: Item arrived on time and I have read everything everyone else experienced. I received 12 herbs and a bonus pack of California Poppies. I don't know if that was intentional or an accident but they are welcome here anyway. The packaging was excellent. Little baggies with approx 1 gram of seeds in each. Cute little illustrations and inspirational quotes as well as detailed instructions and anecdotal information about the herbs medicinal value as well. Also came with a booklet. I read everyone received Lemon Basil but I received Sweet Basil. I haven't planted yet but I have full faith in the seeds as I would if I purchased them from a nursery or garden center.
customer_reviews.author: GreatbasinMom

customer_reviews.title: Better to buy baby plants.
customer_reviews.text: I planted them following directions. I am still awaiting germination. Have yet to see a single tiny plant.
customer_reviews.author: Kay Field

customer_reviews.title: Not impressed
customer_reviews.text: I have planted herbs and veggies for years. I was disappointed in these. None of them came up. Not the first sprout. And it wasn't my dirt or my planting because other herbs that I purchased from other suppliers all came up and thrived. I wouldn't recommend this blend to anyone.
customer_reviews.author: C Huff

customer_reviews.title: More dead seeds! I planted these seeds in fresh ...
customer_reviews.text: More dead seeds! I planted these seeds in fresh planting soil over 3 weeks ago and two plants are growing!!
customer_reviews.author: CialiBrown

customer_reviews.title: I've had pretty good luck with most seeds
customer_reviews.text: I've had pretty good luck with most seeds, but I've tried growing the Parsley and Cilantro twice and I've had 0% germination. The packets for these seeds say "packaged for 2015" so maybe that's why. The rest are labeled for 2016 and they grow just fine. Basil has really taken off!
customer_reviews.author: agray8z

customer_reviews.title: Little success
customer_reviews.text: After two attempts at planting, I finally have a few sprouts. The chives died very quickly but the sage and mint look like they might make it. I'm wondering if the seeds are really old.
customer_reviews.author: the boy's mom

customer_reviews.title: Affordable and good quality
customer_reviews.text: I have received and have planted some of the herbs to grow for the winter under my growing lights. They have sprouted in like 5 days and are now growing. I’m very happy and do recommend these to anyone looking for affordable and good quality herbs
customer_reviews.author: Alysa B.

customer_reviews.title: Ordered as a Mother's Day gift
customer_reviews.text: I ordered the herb seed assortment for my mother who lives several states away. The seeds arrived timely as promised. My mother was very pleased with the seed assortment and looks forward to planting them in her vertical container garden. I chose this variety of herb seeds because it contained the best variety of my mother's favorite culinary herbs, is non-GMO, and was a great value. I look forward to writing a follow-up regarding the growth success and flavor quality in the near future.
customer_reviews.author: MoodyVal

customer_reviews.title: some seeds did well, many have not
customer_reviews.text: the basil has done super! but the cilantro and peppermint have not sprouted at all after 2 tries. The sage and oregano are barely there (only a few plants and about 1/4" high (by comparison, the basil is about 3-5"!). . The chives started to come up and then disappeared. I did not plant some of the items like the savory...
customer_reviews.author: R. A. Achterhof

customer_reviews.title: Easy to Grow
customer_reviews.text: Received these seeds June 5, 2020 and planted them on June 11, 2020. They all are growing with the exception of the Oregano and Peppermint. The Thyme just started to grow this week (07/01/2020). Used Flower Pots, ZOUTOG 6 inch Plastic Planters with Drainage Hole and Tray, Pack of 15 for potting and Miracle Grow soil.
customer_reviews.author: Tania

customer_reviews.title: 1/30 Cilantro seeds germinated.
customer_reviews.text: At the same time I was planting a wide variety of seeds, the only thing that didn't germinate were these seeds -- particularly the Cilantro.
customer_reviews.author: Mister A

customer_reviews.title: business gifts
customer_reviews.text: We're planning to use these as business gifts. The seed packs arrived quickly and were in great shape. I can't wait to start giving them out.
customer_reviews.author: Mo Past

customer_reviews.title: Fair variety
customer_reviews.text: I ordered this not really knowing all of the seeds it included. Here is what I got: sage, parsley, basil (lemon, I prefer sweet basil), oregano, marjoram, savory, garlic chives, mustard, dill, cilantro, chives, and thyme. I would have preferred to have rosemary instead of the garlic chives, but I like to experiment with my cooking, so I may actually like them. They arrived in a moisture resistant pouch, with the seeds in normal seed packets. There were no directions included, so I recommend researching each one you intend to plant for best tips. I planted them 5 days ago and all are starting to spout already. I recommend starting them inside first.
customer_reviews.author: Ashley

customer_reviews.title: only when required use great potting soil and still had no success
customer_reviews.text: I wish I could give zero stars .These herbs didn’t even germinate,I planted watered ,only when required use great potting soil and still had no success. It has been almost a month, I tried 2 batches, I Just wasted my money ,not worth buying . I was desperate to have this herb garden and just left me in a disssapointment .DONOT WASTE YOUR MONEY
customer_reviews.author: Butterflyblue

customer_reviews.title: oops
customer_reviews.text: I was so excited to receive my package of seeds! I started planting in my little containers, labeling as I went. Each packet had plenty of seeds. But, imagine my surprise when I opened the package for peppermint seeds and found nothing but air. Unless those babies were microscopic or invisible, I got an empty package! Hoping to see the rest of these herbs grow tall and strong so I can use them in my cooking for the coming year.
customer_reviews.author: Brian W. Fowle

customer_reviews.title: Duds
customer_reviews.text: Unfortunately none of these seeds worked for me. I tried them both in my aerogarden and just in seed starter soil. Duds!
customer_reviews.author: R

customer_reviews.title: Very bad seeds
customer_reviews.text: Zero germination!!! And the peppermint package was empty! Bad seeds. Don’t waste your money
customer_reviews.author: Josiane

customer_reviews.title: We are loving these seeds!
customer_reviews.text: We are currently starting our garden early in our basement with some new grow lights. We have tried to plant most of the seeds from True Leaf! They are all growing little by little. We love our assortment and that they are non-gmo and that they have all germinated! Yay! Hopefully, we will have a kitchen full of fresh grown herbs this year! Thanks True Leaf!
customer_reviews.author: Laurel Fetzer

customer_reviews.title: Great assortment but...
customer_reviews.text: I really do like this assortment however a couple of herbs won't germinate no matter how many times I replant. Peppermint, and thyme.
customer_reviews.author: Ben Burns

customer_reviews.title: So far, so good
customer_reviews.text: It's late in the growing season, but I did plant some cilantro in late August, and it's growing like a weed. I'm planting the other herbs next spring, so perhaps I should post an update then.
customer_reviews.author: Deborah Allen

customer_reviews.title: Great variety for cooking!
customer_reviews.text: Love the variety of seeds. There are plenty in every package. The mustard greens have already sprouted! The rest of the seeds are starting to sprout. Very happy with this purchase.
customer_reviews.author: Angela Hall

customer_reviews.title: Not the mix I hoped for.
customer_reviews.text: Not quite the selection of varieties I would have purchased separately. It is a wide mix of herbs. I have planted them all.
customer_reviews.author: Christina L Dunn

customer_reviews.title: Herbs...
customer_reviews.text: Husband planted with grandson. I am thinking they are too tiny and spindly to eat but coming up nicely on back porch.
customer_reviews.author: C. Endorf

customer_reviews.title: Makes a nice Gift
customer_reviews.text: I just got my order today via Amazon Prime, right on time. Package was neat and informative, a ziploc bag with two helpful booklets, the 12 seed packets (most containing what appear to be 100 seeds), and a personal note from the seller who owns the operation. Very colorful, has all the right information, not too complex. VERY good value for the money. This would make a nice gift to a budding gardner (pun intended), especially since it contains instructions about starting from seed which are hard to find on the internet.
customer_reviews.author: brainout

customer_reviews.title: They are sprouting
customer_reviews.text: Very pleased, the seeds are sprouting. Four so far, dill, oregano, thyme and parsley. 2 weeks with a grow light. I spritz with water daily.
customer_reviews.author: E. Ferguson

customer_reviews.title: 50/50 growth
customer_reviews.text: Some of the herbs grew, some did not. I am not sure if its a bad batch or not. Still a work in progress
customer_reviews.author: Brianna Loe

customer_reviews.title: Fantastic Grow Rate, even held up in less than ideal conditions
customer_reviews.text: Every spring I start seed ordering, and then eventually forget to plant some. I did that with this pack. I've started them late this year, last week directly in pots. Every day it said it would rain but it didn't, and they got dried out a few days. I've never seen plants grow this well from seeds without nonstop watering and care. I think that these herbs are very healthy and the seeds are very new to sprout the way that they did. Excellent buy, all in one kit. Only problem is finding enough pots to put them all in!
customer_reviews.author: MJ

customer_reviews.title: All seeds are sprouting
customer_reviews.text: No complaints at all. So far I've planted Garlic Chives, Summer Savory, Basil, Cillantro, and Sage. All have sprouted, and are growing vigorously under a 50 watt LED grow light.
customer_reviews.author: S. Scissons

customer_reviews.title: Very nice assortment
customer_reviews.text: The plants that grew were great however there were too many seeds that didn’t grow. That was an issue because there weren’t enough seeds per packet to allow for seeds not germinating.
customer_reviews.author: Regina Chance

customer_reviews.title: Great quality!!
customer_reviews.text: It was packaged really well. I planted a few of each and every single one sprouted. We got a heat wave and they died in the full sun. I planted some more in the shade and they sprouted right away and are doing great! I still have plenty more for next year too!
customer_reviews.author: dawn

customer_reviews.title: Not recommended - harvest was dismal.
customer_reviews.text: I planted these seeds in outdoor planters and did not harvest much at all...maybe they would do okay indoors. Some of the seeds did not come up at all and others yielded very small plants. I grow lots of plants and everyone tells me I have "the touch" so it is unusual for my plants to not grow.
customer_reviews.author: goose

customer_reviews.title: Seeds look great.
customer_reviews.text: The set looks really good and with seeds you have to wait for grow time so I won’t know until they are grown.
customer_reviews.author: kolleartist

customer_reviews.title: 11/12 have germinated and sprouted... now try to keep them watered until fall.
customer_reviews.text: I figured that a 50% rate would be good enough for this mother's day project for my kids. We soaked all the seeds for 24 hours and then "planted" in stackable planters for mother's day herb garden...so now just over 2 weeks we've got 11 of 12 herbs sprouted and growing some more vigorously than others. We're still a couple months from actually having any "herbs" to snip and cook into dinner but this is farming after all...Basil and Thyme are the weakest performers so far... but apparently the mustard greens are really, really happy with my kids' and my amateur germination and haphazard sweeping onto the dirt planting system...
customer_reviews.author: Brian D. Lyman

customer_reviews.title: Way cool
customer_reviews.text: I've been hesitant to start a garden, as I am new to the high desert area I live in. After recieving this packet I feel confident about going forth. Each packet has very clear instructions. She also added a small booklet that, not only explains how to grow each herb, but also how to harvest, cure, and what that herbs medicinal and other health factors. She also adds little quotes that are really cool.... I look forward to purchasing more products from Ziggysgal...
customer_reviews.author: Jeff

customer_reviews.title: Highly Recommended
customer_reviews.text: i can't begin to tell you how pleased i am with this order 10 of the 12 of packages of herb seeds germinated very fast and grew the most amazing herb garden. i have been ordering garden seeds for many years and this is the first time i received this kind of results. highly recommended for any gardener
customer_reviews.author: jujunme

customer_reviews.title: disappointing
customer_reviews.text: some of the packets were empty, peppermint and thyme. The seed for paragon and rosemary did not grow. I contacted the seller and was told sometime the packet are empty in error, was told they would send me those seeds, never did. Then the rosemary and tarragon did not grow. disappointing
customer_reviews.author: ERIN DEMIRJIAN

customer_reviews.title: Great Seeds from a good company.
customer_reviews.text: Liked that there are simple directions and that this company sells bingo seeds. Will be using these for a planting session with our new Penn State Master Gardeners.
customer_reviews.author: ,Deb great fun

customer_reviews.title: I wasn't highly impressed with this product due to the ...
customer_reviews.text: I really liked these seeds. They (the one's I planted) Have all responded quickly and totally. Every seed I planted just about sprouted. Very nice germination and quick delivery. I would definitely recomend these to my friends. And I have!
customer_reviews.author: Mark

customer_reviews.title: Seeds did not germinate well
customer_reviews.text: I was disappointed because half of the seeds did not germinate.
customer_reviews.author: Michelle St Claire

customer_reviews.title: Germinate real quick
customer_reviews.text: So far planted 4 herbs and 3 of them germinated and sprouted within 1-2 days. Very happy and can't wait to plant the rest! Unfortunately, pepper mint did not germinate at all though.
customer_reviews.author: Michael Plietz

customer_reviews.title: All are growing!
customer_reviews.text: Put then under a grow light in seeding soil and they have all taken off in the last few weeks. Mustard is growing like crazy and the chives are also doing very well. Will also have more than enough for next years planting if don’t keep them alright till next spring...
customer_reviews.author: charlotte roberts

customer_reviews.title: Great seeds with lots of sprouts!
customer_reviews.text: I bought these the first time for my own herb garden and loved them so much I rebought another order to sprout to feed to my chickens. Love them!
customer_reviews.author: Kayla

customer_reviews.title: Great Germination Rates!
customer_reviews.text: I had exceptional germination rates on these seeds! I sterilized sphagnum peat in the microwave, soaked the soil with water, planted the seeds, and put each pot in a sealed plastic sandwich bag. I set them on the windowsill. Each variety sprouted. The package the seeds came in was sealed well. The last "hold-out" was parsley, which finally sprouted today! It turns out that parsley is notorious for taking 3-4 weeks to germinate.
customer_reviews.author: Janice B

customer_reviews.title: Happy With The Results
customer_reviews.text: We live in Charleston and have a mini-farm where we grow many herbs as well as vegetables. I planted these seeds in two of my garden boxes in late March. It's now late April and they are coming up nicely. Not every seed will sprout, no matter how awesome the source plant was. But I'm happy with the results from these.
customer_reviews.author: MizJones

customer_reviews.title: Great assortment of seeds
customer_reviews.text: Great assortment of seeds. My daughter planted them and they are growing well. Very happy with this purchase.
customer_reviews.author: chuck chung

customer_reviews.title: I’m happy with seeds
customer_reviews.text: I have planted seeds from three packets so far. I placed seed pots in terrarium/greenhouse container for sprouting with a grow light for soil warmth. Seeds have started growing nicely.
customer_reviews.author: ruthieo54

customer_reviews.title: Already starting the seeds
customer_reviews.text: This set of seeds was a Christmas present for my daughter. She enjoys growing and tasting her own veggies. She just started them not too long ago and they are already growing nicely. With these seeds, this will be her first attempt to grow herbs. Fingers crossed. They did come in a timely manner.
customer_reviews.author: Brenda

customer_reviews.title: Different seeds - all work
customer_reviews.text: All the seeds grew into nice plants. The mustard is great and easy to grow.
customer_reviews.author: Mar MC

customer_reviews.title: Seeds mixed up
customer_reviews.text: Seed packets open inside the sealed container so no idea what seed is which.
customer_reviews.author: shesapples

customer_reviews.title: Lost of Variety!!!
customer_reviews.text: I got more than I real!! The variety is amazing!!!
customer_reviews.author: Megan Shelton

customer_reviews.title: Not all seeds sprouted 🤨
customer_reviews.text: All the seeds came up EXCEPT the chives. By the time this became evident my window to have replaced had passed.
customer_reviews.author: Carenlynne

customer_reviews.title: I'm summing this up to bad seeds. I even gave some to my grandma ...
customer_reviews.text: I can grow succulents from seed but these, year none of these have even sprouted yet. I'm summing this up to bad seeds. I even gave some to my grandma who has a green thumb and she can't get them to do anything.
customer_reviews.author: Kim

customer_reviews.title: Easy start just perfect for an indoor garden.
customer_reviews.text: Lots of seeds in each packet. Already growing. I started some of them for indoor use.
customer_reviews.author: David C Loop

customer_reviews.title: Easy to grow
customer_reviews.text: I planted these over a week ago and 4 have already sprouted! Super easy to grow and I'm looking forward to using them!
customer_reviews.author: Kaitlyn

customer_reviews.title: Enough for a whole year
customer_reviews.text: Used to start a herb garden; will see what happens
customer_reviews.author: vickie dravinski

customer_reviews.title: Only one packet of seeds germinated.
customer_reviews.text: The only seeds to germinate, were the mustard greens. the remaining 11 packets did nothing...
customer_reviews.author: Rick M

customer_reviews.title: Fast growth
customer_reviews.text: Seeds grew almost immediately. We planted and then 2 days later some had started sprouting. 2 weeks later all have sprouted and are developing into big plants. Really pleased with the quality.
customer_reviews.author: 1960 Chevy Pickup

customer_reviews.title: Great germination! Nice plants.
customer_reviews.text: These seeds came up very well. I was happy with everything but would have liked to see rosemary included in the selection..
customer_reviews.author: Ann Lukens

customer_reviews.title: The seeds are great!
customer_reviews.text: Planted 6 various seeds. ^ plants are growing. Excellent product!
customer_reviews.author: roger321

customer_reviews.title: assortment of 12 culinary herb seeds
customer_reviews.text: started to planting them today in my flowerpots and making a garden full of herbs to use for cooking in my foods.. i am so happy i started planting my seeds today .. next need more to start planting in my kitchen window sill to start smelling the wonderful aroma fragrant of my herbs ... i advise anyone to buy these and start growing their own...
customer_reviews.author: maryannd

customer_reviews.title: everything grew well
customer_reviews.text: I have a garden in the corner of my kitchen. So cool. The soft purple glow from the grow lights add an element of tranquility to the room!
customer_reviews.author: Tom

customer_reviews.title: Just for fun: )
customer_reviews.text: Tons of seeds! Wow! There are so many in every packet. Crazy. Interesting the packages inside are somewhat varying on style. I planted them up even though it's late October and hope to get some last minute herbs in the ground. Just for fun :)
customer_reviews.author: J. Wechsler

customer_reviews.title: Germination is a go!
customer_reviews.text: All the seeds I planted have germinated and are thriving!
customer_reviews.author: Sunny

customer_reviews.title: Christmas present for my brother he liked it cause he loves to garden and use his ...
customer_reviews.text: Christmas present for my brother he liked it cause he loves to garden and use his own food for recipes so was the perfect present at a great price
customer_reviews.author: Devrose

customer_reviews.title: The packaging for this was good with only one exception
customer_reviews.text: Seeds arrived quickly and I was able to start the plants that I wanted. The packaging for this was good with only one exception: the bags of seeds themselves does close back up so i had to "clip" them shut so they don't spill in the larger bag. Overall though, it was well worth the price for the amount of seeds, the instructions provided and the variety.
customer_reviews.author: Emeline Rodenas

customer_reviews.title: I'm very happy with these seeds
customer_reviews.text: All 12 sprouted and grew into huge plants. I'm very happy with these seeds
customer_reviews.author: Amazoner

customer_reviews.title: Duplicated packs
customer_reviews.text: Disappointed on 2 duplicate items. And chives and rosemary can only be used so much. I expected 12 DIFFERENT seed packs.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Seed packets are nice and full of seeds
customer_reviews.text: Can't wait to plant all these in spring. Can't wait to see how they grow.
customer_reviews.author: Donna Robinson

customer_reviews.title: Good seeds, good price
customer_reviews.text: I was very excited to see my order arrive in the mail so quickly. Everything manages to fit in a business sized envelope. The seeds are packaged in individual baggies with the seed name and growing instructions on the back. There are a generous amount of seeds in each baggie. The package also includes a booklet of instructions and a flier for the seller's website. The individual herb pictures are very cute and the inserts are colorful and fun. I planted dill, cilantro, savory, thyme and marjoram a few days ago in individual planters and already seeing sprouts come up. I'm a novice planter, so it is really excited to see results! I would buy from this seller again.
customer_reviews.author: Sci-Fi Fan

customer_reviews.title: Economical and good germination rate
customer_reviews.text: Growing some of these herbs from seed is dicey so I planted these with low expectations.I used to buy nursery seedlings but am glad I bought these seeds. I had great luck with the basil, parsley and chives in both pots and window boxes. The sage is taking off. I am very pleased with these seeds and am encouraged by their quality.
customer_reviews.author: Anne

customer_reviews.title: Great inexpensive way to bump up your cooking.
customer_reviews.text: Great value and let me experiment with some other seeds. They all grew quite well in the MN climate. We started some early inside and others I seeded directly. They all were planted outside in rain barrel planters. Mixed in some flowers as well, but so convenient to just run out to porch and grab some fresh herbs. Saved a lot of money with this
customer_reviews.author: srh

customer_reviews.title: indoor garden
customer_reviews.text: i have a design for recycled water bottles into hanging herb pots, not sure what seed i needed i ordered this set and in checking them it looks like there is everything i need to get started, i can hardly wait
customer_reviews.author: jaynec50

customer_reviews.title: Loved it, most of the seeds I planted germinated ...
customer_reviews.text: Loved it, most of the seeds I planted germinated well and gave me my herbs. Some didn't of course, but I can't say if it was because of the seeds or because I didn't water them enough. Otherwise, not a bad way to start an herb garden.
customer_reviews.author: Jjark2018

customer_reviews.title: Good product
customer_reviews.text: Overall this is a great product Everything didn’t grow for me but quite a few herbs did. I would buy it again
customer_reviews.author: Karin

customer_reviews.title: so far so good
customer_reviews.text: Planted marjoram, dill, basil, summer savory, chives. All sprouted on the fourth day! Dill came out on the fifth. Planted in seedling containers and kept warm at the bottom on a window sill with full light but not direct sun. Hope the get well established. Looking good for now.
customer_reviews.author: DonDon

customer_reviews.title: A great product.
customer_reviews.text: Since they have just started to grow I really cannot say anything about the flavor. I will be using the plants for a demonstration at a talk about Herbs and then giving them away to the participants.
customer_reviews.author: Rita V Grant

customer_reviews.title: There are plenty of seeds to try try again for especially newbs
customer_reviews.text: Even with me being a newb I was able to get everything to sprout. I am not very good at transplanting so a few are being started again. This is the best i could do to get peppermint to sprout.
customer_reviews.author: Benjamin Shapiro

product_meta.title: Living Whole Foods Assortment of 12 Culinary Herb Seeds - Non-GMO | Grow Cooking Herbs: Parsley, Thyme, Cilantro, Basil, Dill, Oregano, Sage & More
feature_bullets: INCLUDES: Parsley, Thyme, Cilantro / Coriander, Basil, Dill, Oregano, Peppermint, Chives, Savory, Garlic Chives, Mustard, Sage.
HIGH QUALITY SEEDS: Grown in the USA, non-GMO seeds with high germination rates. Lovingly harvested fresh from the most recent season.

GARDEN TO TABLE: 12 popular herb seeds carefully selected for your favorite recipes. Nothing tastes better than food cooked with fresh, home grown herbs and spices. Each seed variety was chosen for maximum flavor intensity.

MAKES A GREAT GIFT: Our culinary herb seeds make excellent Christmas gifts for gardeners, unique kitchen gifts for cooking enthusiasts, special Mother’s Day garden gifts, and they are the perfect herb seeds for kids and families.
US BASED COMPANY: Living Whole Foods and True Leaf Market are based in Utah with full support from our grow smart, in-house customer service team.
